## OWebRouter.addHistory() method

Adds history.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
addHistory(url: string, state: ORouteStateObject, title?: string): this;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  url | string | the url |
|  state | [ORouteStateObject](./oweb.oroutestateobject.md) | the history state |
